description: This is a JavaScript source file defining a UI component named 'Header' using the LightningJS framework. The file imports themes and Lightning components, and exports a component that renders a header with title and action buttons, managing styles and dynamic actions.

classes.name: Header
classes.description: A UI header component with title and action buttons, customizable via addAction method.

methods.name: addAction
methods.description: Adds a button action to the header with label, click handler, and variant styling.
